name: Mark And Dave Are No Longer Friendly Buggers Who Say Hello When They Meet In the Street!!!!!!!!!
description: More deathmatching antics, this time for Doom 2 only. Also, Dave has done some real work on this one. Why the name? To prevent confusion with the Doom 2 version of Mark & Dave's Deathmatch No. 1 (MB_DCT2.WAD).
